title: Purdue Pharma Looks to Extend Bankruptcy Shield to Sacklers
text:
OxyContin maker Purdue Pharma LP’s bankruptcy filing sets up a showdown with law-enforcement officials seeking to rein in the industry they blame for causing the national opioid epidemic.

Hours after seeking bankruptcy protection for the company Sunday night, Purdue’s lawyers said they would ask a judge to issue an injunction that would halt legal hostilities from attorneys general who won’t sign on to a settlement the drugmaker has offered. The company’s owners, members of the wealthy Sackler family, are entitled to a shield...
description: OxyContin maker Purdue Pharma’s bankruptcy filing sets up a showdown with law-enforcement officials over the role of the Sackler family, the drug company’s owners.
